titleStmt.title: An exhortation of the churches of Bohemia to the Church of England wherein is set forth the good of unity, order, discipline, and obedience in churches rightly now, or to be constituted : with a description premised of the order and discipline used in the churches of the Brethren of Bohemia / by J. Amos Commenius.
titleStmt.author: Comenius, Johann Amos, 1592-1670.

notesStmt.note: "Written in Latin and dedicated to His Most Excellent Majesty Charles the Second in Holland, at his returning into England, if possible it may be for an accommodation amongst the churches of Christ."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
